channel.title: Why cant i run Minecraft after I download it?
channel.description: i Finally bought Minecraft today but after i downloaded i tried to make a short cut and when i tried to run it a message came up saying "Failed to load Main-Class manifest from attributes from C:/users/Scott/AppData/Roaming/.minecraft/bin/minecraftjar" does anyone know a way to fix this

item.title: Why cant i run Minecraft after I download it?
item.dc:creator: @golden1 golden1
item.description:
@golden1 wrote:

ok i finally fixed it all i had to do was re-install it.

Read full topic

item.title: Why cant i run Minecraft after I download it?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9`, post:4, topic:421383”]shouldn’t it be C:/users/Scott/AppData/Roaming/.minecraft/bin/minecraftjar"
Also not sure you can just run the jar file (without command line arguments at any rate) but you can download the launcher from the official site and try that.[/quote]

should be

C:/users/Scott/AppData/Roaming/.minecraft/bin/minecraft.jar"

Read full topic
item.source: Why cant i run Minecraft after I download it?

item.title: Why cant i run Minecraft after I download it?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

shouldn’t it be C:/users/Scott/AppData/Roaming/.minecraft/bin/minecraftjar"
Also not sure you can just run the jar file (without command line arguments at any rate) but you can download the launcher from the official site and try that.

Read full topic
